aors.data.evt.sim
Interface SimulationEventListener

All Superinterfaces:
java.util.EventListener
All Known Subinterfaces:
Module
All Known Implementing Classes:
AORJavaGui, AORJavaWebStartGui, InitialStateUIController, InitialStateUIController, ModuleController, PhysicsController, SoundController, StatisticsCore, Visualization, Visualization
public interface SimulationEventListener
extends java.util.EventListener

SimulationEventListener - This interface has to be implemented by any part that has to be an listener for simulation events, such as start, stop, pause or initialize the simulation.

Since:
October 26, 2009

simulationPaused

void simulationPaused(boolean pauseState)
This method is called when the simulation is paused or continued after a previous pause.

Parameters:
pauseState - true if pause the simulation and false if continue the simulation after pause
